sentences.sContent: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.sCn: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.sContent: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.sCn: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.sContent: ...watch videos or listen to music and so on with it as morally as you do with a brand-new one...
...if you can’t enjoy the music at a sensible volume...
...What does the woman say about her music experience...
...and in new business models for pricing and distributing music and mobile software online...
...So you enjoyed classical music even when you were very young...
...the fund also goes to purchasing musical instruments and painting tools so that children in rural and mountainous areas now can take music and painting classes...
...The music would sound not quite right...
...Next he pulls up a music composition textbook...
...It's clear why this would be something a music major would love...
